website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung ATIV Book 9 Plus goes toe to toe with the best premium ultrabooks, then tops it off with a jaw-dropping high-resolution display.
pros: High-resolution display boasts 3,200-by-1,800 resolution and 10-finger touch
Fourth-generation Intel Core i5 processor and 128GB solid-state drive keep things speedy
Hinge stands up to touch but still opens wide
cons: Marquee software options have limited appeal
Dongles for VGA and HDMI not included

customer_reviews.title: One of the best ULTRABOOK 2014
customer_reviews.text: - Very expensive. - Does not bring a cover as other ultrabooks in the market. - Keyboard is not excellent. +- WiFi didnt worked well at first but with the updates it now amazing! +- Some Samsung pre-installed apps are tempting me to drop my LG G2 and buy a SGS5 but still have to wait for LG G3 :D +- Camera is SoSo ... + GREAT screen. Colors and brightness are very accurate. Other Ultrabooks has Resolution/Colors/Brightness issues, go to any store and do a good research first. + Battery life is amazing. + Sound is very loud and great :) + It's very powerful.
customer_reviews.author: krlosRD

customer_reviews.title: An amazing laptop with tremendous bloatware
customer_reviews.text: One of the best and most robust laptops I have used till date. The only one that surpasses this is the Surface Book. Great battery life, robust yet beautiful design and a gorgeous screen. Be prepared to deal with a ridiculous amount of bloatware that you will have to sift through to see which are necessary and which are not. Honestly, its frustrating to not know which are critical. I chose a laptop with lower capacity and regretted it but it was quickly remedied with an external backup SSD.
customer_reviews.author: Sumit Pathak

customer_reviews.title: This is poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: I would give tp his 5 stars, but the touchpad has stopped working after 18 months - out of warrenty. A google search shows other users seeking a solution. I've sent the computer to Intelisol, Samsung's service provider, they have had it for a while now, so that I had to call to check on it. They lied about calling me, But said they would put it in the repair que. This is poor quality control.
customer_reviews.author: VISailor

customer_reviews.title: Great Ultrabook!
customer_reviews.text: I had tried the Acer S7, Asus UX301LA and this is by far the best. Build quality is better than the others, keyboard is fantastic(accepting the shallow ultrabook typical key travel), speed is excellent and battery life is better than the competition (7-8 hours of excel, web use). While there are still some scaling issues with such a high resolution, this is true with any laptop using a high resolution display and says more about the software developers than Samsung or even Microsoft.
customer_reviews.author: Gsinid

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with the item.
customer_reviews.text: The item came with a lousy screen and seems to have irremovable particles on it. The battery heated up immediately I started charging it and run out so fast. it had a very visible scratch on the surface when it arrived. Definitely returning it after just a few hours of usage.
customer_reviews.author: Milz

customer_reviews.title: Another Samsung delight
customer_reviews.text: This laptop links with all of my other Samsung gear. It is light and easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Chappell

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I'm nothing but happy with this machine. It's super fast, has an amazing screen, and it boots up in seconds. I mainly use it to DJ and edit photos and videos, and it's doing a great job. The portability is outstanding, and it's so thin.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Fast, flat and fun
customer_reviews.text: Love my new laptop. Has already been around the world with me and it's a joy to carry it through airport security. I hardly know its in my bag. It boots up quickly and the resolution is fab. I wish the price were lower, but otherwise, not one complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Vincenzo

customer_reviews.title: screen is very beautiful and sharp
customer_reviews.text: The machine is very fast, screen is very beautiful and sharp. The only thing I have found weird is the yellow color: yellow is more like brown. However, pictures display properly, great color, yellow included. It seems to have something to do with a setting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovve it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my husband for Christmas. He loves loves loves it! He is definitely a computer geek, so him being impressed with this laptop is definitely saying something. I just wish they had more covers for them. I was only able to get a sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: Nishai

customer_reviews.title: I just love this laptop - now, about learning Windows 8
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop. Touch screen and all the bells and whistles. this is the first time that I had encounter Windows 8. Now, that is a whole different ball game. I guess it will take some time to get use to W8. Hello Youtube lessons!
customer_reviews.author: John K.

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop.
customer_reviews.text: I use the touchscreen less than what I though I would. Really powerful for its size. I would definitely recommend this product if you are looking for a pc alternative to a macbook air.
customer_reviews.author: BeMobile

customer_reviews.title: Item is nice and sleek as classified
customer_reviews.text: Item is nice and sleek as classified. The wireless connection had a bit of problem when I first turned on, it could not sense any network. I needed to consult a friend on how to configure the unit. After some meddling, it suddenly worked. We don't know what we did. It is not like this with all the other computers I bought. Otherwise I would have guven it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Tay Boon Hwee

customer_reviews.title: I'm a gadget guy and I highly recommend this computer
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly portable and sleek yet powerful. I'm a gadget guy and I highly recommend this computer. The only downfall is that Windows and Windows programs are not terribly good at handling high dpi screens. But this should not stop you if you want an ultraportable PC computer.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Are

customer_reviews.title: It's a good laptop
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 problems with the laptop: 1- It's a fingerprint magnet 2- There is a lot of programs that aren't ready for this resolution 3- I have problems updating the track pad drivers and the actual driver don't save my settings when I restart the pc.
customer_reviews.author: EJBC

customer_reviews.title: Very good computer. Small internal storage
customer_reviews.text: Very good computer. Small internal storage, when too much is on it can be slow. Keep having to upload a fix because the coloration of the screen is off, and it reverts every time it is updated.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Spangz

customer_reviews.title: Made a Great Christmans Gift!
customer_reviews.text: A really nice computer which had everything my wife wanted in her Christmas gift! Happy wife, happy life!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: I love this laptop
customer_reviews.text: I love this laptop. gorgeous build; sturdy, durable, and just feels awesome to use! screen is the best I've seen on a laptop. Samsung sure knows how to build beautiful screens...I just love it.
customer_reviews.author: brian yi

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome laptop. Made a good choice here. Really does boot Windows 8.1 in 6 seconds!
customer_reviews.author: Emzy B.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing laptop
customer_reviews.text: Light, beautiful, quick, comfortable. The only thing I would change is Windows 8, not to my liking. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Federico

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely delighted with my new Samsung ATIV Book 9 Plus
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely delighted with my new Samsung ATIV Book 9 Plus. It's extremely light and more importantly the battery seems to last forever which is great when travelling a lot. Although based in the UK, I purchased it through Amazon.com from America and saved around GBP500 so for me, very good value as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Horwood

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Keyboard uncomfortable [as if hitting on a rock] and it is cold during winter time.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew John

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Nice design, quality is second to none, performance is great.
customer_reviews.author: Hesham Al-Buloushi

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it! Light, gorgeous screen, she has no problem reading it, great keyboard, loves the instant-on with Solid-state drive.
customer_reviews.author: Alan M.

customer_reviews.title: Superb computer
customer_reviews.text: I have now had this replacement for a previous Samsung Series 9 for two weeks. By far the best PC I have ever used. Windows 8.1 running on the spec of this machine is superb. Start up is seconds, screen quality excellent and everything I have tried runs flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: MarkN

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Almost perfect, took several updates for everything to function correctly. Super light, powerful, and incredible battery power
customer_reviews.author: Dave Chrisman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent laptop. Premium quality but resolution a bit tricky ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent laptop. Premium quality but resolution a bit tricky to setup. However, it works great with Windows 10 Preview.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Jarjour

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. I have been using Thinkpad before
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. I have been using Thinkpad before, Now I finally found replacement.
customer_reviews.author: CMe4RE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great machine! Good keyboard even though it is a touch screen.
customer_reviews.author: Joelle Prokupek

customer_reviews.title: Laptop is great
customer_reviews.text: Laptop meets all my expectations and once I have removed some of the Samsung bloat-ware, have nothing but praise for this device
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Branik

customer_reviews.title: Step into the future.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, slim and sexy good looks, bundles with great performance and a brilliant display. Windows 8.1 is preinstalled and works seamlessly with all of the programs and peripheral equipment I installed.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt K.

customer_reviews.title: Windows 8 is a terrible OS.
customer_reviews.text: Nice computer. But Windows 8 spoils it. There is not way to downgrade to windows 7 ultimate because the drivers don't exist in windows 7. The computer is nice and thin. The touch pad is too slippery not too much traction.
customer_reviews.author: C. C. T.

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop although Windows 8 is a new learning experience
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop although Windows 8 is a new learning experience. My arthritic fingers have a hard time adjusting to the touch screen.
customer_reviews.author: Fuji

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Thin, light, terrific resolution. This laptop is terrific -- it's a terrific blend of touch screen and laptop. Excellent for work and photo editing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but it does have freeze problems
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking laptop, sometimes you get freeze laptop..... and your work just disappear...
customer_reviews.author: Shoppermaniac

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it!!! Great shipping time, works perfectly out of the gate!
customer_reviews.author: R. H.

customer_reviews.title: Stupid notebook, Just can't get the Wi-Fi connection to ...
customer_reviews.text: Stupid notebook, Just can't get the Wi-Fi connection to work. So unreliable, keep dropping signals constantly, at home and away on business. Have no problem with my other notebooks. Called customer service and they told us to reset to original setting. Which we did and still having issues. Nothing has been installed on the notebook, bought this notebook just for the internet experience and it's nothing but trouble with wi-fi issue!!! I need to return this useless notebook!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tuyet F.

customer_reviews.title: Samsung ATIV 9 Plus i7... SUPERB!
customer_reviews.text: My i7 ATV finally arrived and it's superb. the best built laptop on the market today. windows 8.1 is fantastic once you get used to it and learn it's nuances and tricks, a very powerful operating system. The Samsung build quality is unmatched, even by apple standards, and the screen is unrivaled. any issues newbies are bringing up about tint can EASILY be rectified by a simple adjustment, everything is customizable. this unit is slightly faster than the i5 version I had before and the extra GB's of the SSD is greatly needed... Boot time in under 5 seconds. this is easily a five star machine.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Schumacher

customer_reviews.title: Non USA residents buying on Amazon.com, DO NOT BUY A SAMSUNG PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.text: Wifi Adaptor has never worked. These things happen but what matters is how a company's customer services deals with this. Samsung have been hopeless. For a multinational company, they do not have a clue to how to deal with customers outside of the USA, they do not listen to you properly, ignore instructions and then abdicate any responsibility when they get things wrong. This is my first ever Samsung product and it will be my last. My simple advice for non USA residents buying on Amazon.com, DO NOT BUY A SAMSUNG PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: John Cook

customer_reviews.title: Wifi
customer_reviews.text: Samsung could not solve the problem with the wifi. Wifi does not work at 25 feet away from the router.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Baptista

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating and awful computer
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst computer I have owned. I had to turn the touchscreen off because even moving the mouse within a word document was changing me from app to app. Even with the touch screen off, it randomly will increase or decrease magnification when you move the mouse. I spend most of my time trying to use the computer rather than actually getting any work done. Extremely frustrating to use. I am just outside my 30- day window (trying to give myself time to "get used to it"), and will now be trashing this computer and buying another one. Strongly regret that I bought this computer.
customer_reviews.author: Ozlem Y.

customer_reviews.title: This is the absolute worst computer I have ever purchased.
customer_reviews.text: I saved my money up so that I could buy a laptop computer with all the bells and whistles. This computer is an absolute pig. Most of my business software does not work properly on this Samsung ATIV Book 9. I contacted Amazon to try to return this frustrating non working computer and since it was 3 weeks after the guaranteed refund date they want to charge me a 20% restocking fee. This is how Amazon treats a loyal ten year customer with over 225 orders. I highly recommend that you never buy a Samsung Computer; furthermore, I highly recommend that you do not purchase anything of value from Amazon because they do not back up the products they sell.
customer_reviews.author: DANIEL K YOWELL
